home.subtitle: Designing the future of Unmanned Aerial Vehicles with indigenous and national engineering solutions.

achievements.title: Achievement
achievements.subtitle: Excellence and Dedication Since 2016
achievements.sarpDesc: Sarp UAV is our flagship that combines our Combat UAV experience with VTOL (Vertical Takeoff and Landing) capability. It brought the 2025 METU VTOL championship.
achievements.tugberkDesc: In METU VTOL 2022, despite Tuğberk UAV suffering heavy damage, the team repaired it in a record 30 hours and became champion.
achievements.parsDesc: Pars platform was developed with 4 different versions and a total of 9 prototypes tested to achieve its current operational stability and aerodynamic power.
